SA06bsa042_u:2_0: prathamaṃ prāmāṇika ācāryaḥ śiṣye prasāda-sampratyayābhilāṣātmikāṃ śraddhāṃ janayet /
SA06bsa042_u:2_3: āryasaṃghān āmantrya, praṇamya, pādau prakṣālya, āsanaṃ pradāya, uttarānuttarapūjopakaraṇaiḥ sampūjya pūjāmeghamantrānapi triruccaret /
SA06bsa042_u:3_0: stotā sugataviśiṣṭaguṇasmaraṇadvārā sādaraṃ stutvā tattadvṛddhikarāṇyapi padāni uccaret /
SA06bsa042_u:3_3: adhyeṣaṇādibhirdvividhaṃ bodhicittaṃ samutpādya teṣāṃ svasvabhāvaṃ bhedaṃ vaiśiṣṭyañcāpi khyāpayet /
SA06bsa042_u:4_2: hetuṃ, phalaṃ, śikṣākramaṃ, cyutyacyutidoṣaguṇān yathāvidhiśikṣādikamapi vistareṇa nirdiśet /
SA06bsa042_u:4_3: sā ca apramādena samprajanyena smṛtyā ca grahaṇīyeti śikṣeta /
SA06bsa042_u:5_1_1: prajñāniḥsvabhāvatāṃ ca jñātvā triśikṣāṃ trividhaprajñāṃ vā samādhāya caryāpathavidhinā
SA06bsa042_u:6_2: ayaṃ tu lākṣaṇikamahāyānacittotpāda-śikṣā-deśanā-vidhiḥ kramo vā audārikatayā darśitaḥ /
